title: Polki Diamond and Emerald Circular Pendant Haaram with Pearl Lockets
materials: Fresh Water Pearls. Featuring Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a circular pendant adorned with Polki diamonds arranged in a floral pattern. The pendant is accented with vibrant green emeralds. A delicate pearl tassel hangs gracefully below, interspersed with emerald beads, completing the piece. The use of Polki diamonds lends a traditional, regal touch.
colors: White (Polki Diamonds). The contrast between the green and white offers a refreshing and sophisticated palette.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
and traditional ceremonies such as seemantham or half-saree function. Can also be styled with modern outfits for a touch of ethnic elegance.
description: This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a contemporary design. The use of Polki diamonds and emeralds signifies prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional and modern attire.
